0100100000110100 0100001010111001 1 -> sum: 1000101011101110, cout: 0
1111001000110101 0100100110100000 0 -> sum: 0011101111010101, cout: 1
1011111001111000 0010110101001000 0 -> sum: 1110101111000000, cout: 0
